entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
